com.aceucv.vpe.crawler.engine

Class Crawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aceucv.vpe.crawler.engine.Crawler

  • public class Crawler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used as a main crawling engine for the application Is capable of searching for Categories, Items, Offers (later on) Created by ctotolin on 22-Nov-15.
